item.title: Agile - Little Rambling
item.description: WIP - v0.0.1 The state of things in this industry is a bit … “complicated”. Maybe having an entry point could help. What is Software Development? Lots of metaphors have been used to describe or define Software Development. Maybe because it has no definition yet, as of 2020. Software Development as Manufacturing Yeah, no. When a factory manufactures a car, it can be used only by one client - unless we could send that one single car into parallel universes.
